blocks.name: bj-syl66ib
blocks.content: A mixed syllogism inference derived from ~ syl6ib . In addition to ~ bj-dvelimdv1 , it can also shorten ~ alexsubALTlem4 (4821>4812), ~ supsrlem (2868>2863). (Contributed by BJ, 20-Oct-2021.)

blocks.name: bj-orim2
blocks.content: Proof of ~ orim2 from the axiomatic definition of disjunction ( ~ olc , ~ orc , ~ jao ) and minimal implicational calculus. (Contributed by BJ, 4-Apr-2021.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)

blocks.name: bj-peirce
blocks.content: Proof of ~ peirce from minimal implicational calculus, the axiomatic definition of disjunction ( ~ olc , ~ orc , ~ jao ), and Curry's axiom ~ curryax . (Contributed by BJ, 4-Apr-2021.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: bj-currypeirce
blocks.content: Curry's axiom (a non-intuitionistic statement sometimes called a paradox of material implication) implies Peirce's axiom ~ peirce over minimal implicational calculus and the axiomatic definition of disjunction ( ~ olc , ~ orc , ~ jao ). A shorter proof from ~ bj-orim2 , ~ pm1.2 , ~ syl6com is possible if we accept to use ~ pm1.2 , itself a direct consequence of ~ jao . (Contributed by BJ, 15-Jun-2021.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: bj-peircecurry
blocks.content: Peirce's axiom ~ peirce implies Curry's axiom over minimal implicational calculus and the axiomatic definition of disjunction ( ~ olc , ~ orc , ~ jao ). See comment of ~ bj-currypeirce . (Contributed by BJ, 15-Jun-2021.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm bj-peircecurry(wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wo(w0, wi(w0, w1))
} = {
  ax-mp(wo(w0, wi(w0, w1)), wi(w0, wo(w0, wi(w0, w1))))
  orc(w0, wi(w0, w1))
  ax-mp(wi(wi(w0, wo(w0, wi(w0, w1))), wo(w0, wi(w0, w1))), wi(wi(w0, w1), wo(w0, wi(w0, w1))))
  olc(wi(w0, w1), w0)
  mpsyl(wi(wi(w0, w1), wo(w0, wi(w0, w1))), wi(wi(w0, wo(w0, wi(w0, w1))), wo(w0, wi(w0, w1))), wi(wi(wi(wo(w0, wi(w0, w1)), w0), wo(w0, wi(w0, w1))), wo(w0, wi(w0, w1))), wi(wi(wo(w0, wi(w0, w1)), w0), w0))
  peirce(wo(w0, wi(w0, w1)), w0)
  ax-mp(wi(wi(wi(w0, w1), wo(w0, wi(w0, w1))), wi(wi(wo(w0, wi(w0, w1)), w0), w0)), wi(wi(wi(w0, w1), w0), w0))
  peirce(w0, w1)
  peirceroll(w0, w1, wo(w0, wi(w0, w1)))
  peirceroll(wo(w0, wi(w0, w1)), w0, w0)
}
